title: [Gameplay/Visual] FIX ARAM Dashes please!
body:
ARAM has been extremely glitched lately.
Champions with dashes, especially targetted ones like Lee Sin and snowballs results in the champion to skip the animations and just teleport from point a to b. It has been affecting gameplay and other people on my teams are also complaining about it is well. It is really hard to play around teleporting champions.

replies.body: We are working on it :( Unfortunately this issue has been extremely difficult to pin down.

Is it possible these bugs are related to the new cursor? There seem to have been a lot of bugs introduced during that same patch. Bugs including but not limited to the scoreboard no longer mirroring even though the option is selected. I figured I'd mention it here in this comment (aside from the few posts that have been made) since this is the ONLY bug thread with an actual Riot response.

There are a lot of bugs during this patch, but it's not related to the Cursor :)

The scoreboard issue you mentioned is most likely related to Snowball/Dash bugs, in that there was a major network change that changed the way we initialize and load into the game. It's pretty deep down tech, and we fixed a lot of issues with it during the dev cycle but there's definitely issues like these that have been uncovered :(

We're working on fixes for both of these!
Thanks for the response! Hopefully your tech guys figure everything out soon! At least you know what's NOT causing it and that's half of figuring out what actually is :P
if a fix is found before the next patch, would it be hotfixed to live?
That's the goal :) Not all fixes are able to easily be deployed to Live mid-patch, so it'll depend on what it is. But that would be our goal!

What about the Zoe W interaction with snowballs?

It seems when you throw a picked up snowball and grab a new orb before it hits, then you get the CD for Snowball on your W.

My guess would be due to the fact snowball/mark is a two step summoner it messes with her W.

What I don't understand is instead of just simply rolling back the patch that changed it into this gamebreaking bug with no counterplay that makes them INVISIBLE and UNTARGETABLE, and then remaking the current patch and identifying the mistake or issue, they instead let all players live with this bug for almost over a week now, which makes the game annoying af. There's a reason Quinn is top tier atm and it's because of this bug I'm sure.
